attributes.action: Oppose the threatened closure of Park View Primary School in Huyton on Merseyside.
attributes.additional_details: Having heard the proposals by Knowsley Metropolitan Borough Council to close down Park View Primary school in Huyton on Merseyside and opt for the more costly option of extending Roby Park School with the resulting negative impact on pupils and parents, we, the undersigned, make it clear our opposition to this move in favour of the less expensive option of remedial work to Park View School that would solve the issues the local council have raised.
